entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unify RuntimeType with the shared RuntimeType #91704
    9.0.0
  • Automate including the source gen projects in the transport package #91698
  • check-labels action doesn't remove past results #91691
  • CoreCLR clretwallmain.h contains DotNETRuntimeMonoProfiler events #91687
    9.0.0
  • Source generation error in LoggerMessageAttribute in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #91678
    Future
  • Windows 11 issue with Dns.GetHostName and Dns.GetHostByName #91677
  • [MT][browser] ` Wasm.Browser.Config.Sample`, `Wasm.Browser.Config.Sample` fail #91676
  • [MT][browser] `Http.Tests` fails with `Operation is not supported on this platform` #91673
  • Http/SslStress builds failing on main #91672
    9.0.0
  • Adding a module system similar to Java 9's JPMS #91670
    Future
  • Baseservices exceptions unhandled runtime test is failing on apple mobile platforms #91669
    9.0.0
  • Stack buffer overrun- stack cookie check leading to crash in .net6.0 application #91665
  • SEHException on misaligned access #91662
    8.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `WithExecutionMode` fails #91661
  • OSR stress failure in libraries PGO #91654
    9.0.0
  • Failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #91653

Closed

  • Remove Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetHost NuGet packages #35244
    Future
  • `CA2229` conflicts with the new `SYSLIB0051` #90783
    9.0.0
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy for ListDictionaryInternal #91254
    Future
  • Dictionary.TryGetValue(key, out boolvalue) sets boolvalue to false #91689
  • Request: Guidance for easy mac & Linux/WSL terminal apps (full screen/raw tty mode) #91686
  • ClaimsPrincipal and ClaimsIdentity type proxies hide properties on derived types #91526
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run app as administrator at runtime with runas verb #91574
    Future
  • Using the profiler or metadata APIs is it possible to know whether runtime was trimmed? #91598
  • .net 8 preview 7: published Blazor app cannot start with js failed to load blazor.boot.json #90324
    8.0.0
  • StackTraceHiddenAttribute not respected #91309
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/coverage/oldtests/stfldstatic2_r/stfldstatic2_r.dll #91647
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/PREFIX/volatile/1/Box_Unbox_volatile/Box_Unbox_volatile.dll #91648
    9.0.0
  • Make ConfigurationBinder source generator feature-complete #79527
    Future
  • DateTime.TryParse allocates on some failure paths #90907
    9.0.0
  • Mono is not unloading collectible assemblies #91641
  • Assert "rank < MAX_RANK" in runtime/src/coreclr/classlibnative/bcltype/arraynative.cpp Line: 812 #91349
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types #91703
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary imports #91701
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Add Microsoft.Extensions.Options.SourceGeneration to Transport Package #91700
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Improve SPMI space checking calculation #91697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] threads design #91696
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Test improvements for #8418 on CI #91694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove all uses of non `Ex` version of `LoadLibrary` API from PAL #91693
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Create Maintain #91692
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91690
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Move Native AOT outerloop tests to their own pipeline #91684
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Cleanup unused runtime functions #91681
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Remove DebugProxy from ClaimsIdentity and ClaimsPrincipal #91680
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Make LinkedCancellationTokenSource register itself weakly #91679
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • JIT: DNER multiregs with SIMD12s #91674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Hacky workaround for coredistools unsupported instructions #91668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][mini] Fix gshared crash when calling svm and constrained class is interface #91667
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][metadata] Fixes for static virtual methods with interface variance #91664
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91659
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Append job attempt number to log artifact names #91658
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix binder gen compile issues due to inaccessible members and identifier name clashes #91657
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Add late binding lookup in VB.NET for COM objects #91433
    Servicing-approved, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 8.0.0
  • Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types #91660
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Microsoft.Extensions.Options.SourceGeneration to Transport Package #91685
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Remove a little work from CreateManifestAndDescriptors #90435
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add windows stylearguments format to coreclr test scripts #91600
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup native build warnings and unnecessary logos #91563
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove DotNetHost, DotNetHostPolicy, and DotNetHostResolver packages #91655
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow superpmi.exe to find a default JIT #91371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy to ListDictionaryInternal #91355
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Enable interceptors implicitly in binder gen nupkg when generator is enabled #91559
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use `HostApiInvokerApp` for `BundleProbe` test (remove `BundleProbeTester` app) #91636
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Enable output compilation validation in binder gen unit tests #91602
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Log disk space available and consumed by SPMI download #91683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Display SPMI uncompress target directory #91682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some dead/unnecessary build steps #91634
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Remove browser wasm from perf_slow #91429
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove DebugProxy from ClaimsIdentity and ClaimsPrincipal #91649
    area-System.Security
  • Remove libraries_tests PMI collection #91365
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix Interlocked.Or/And for arm64 #91557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ldapur instruction #91652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Activate Disabled HTTP/3 Test #91629
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V, LoongArch64] Fix assert(!regArgMaskLive) in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs #91414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • SPMI: Optimize collection download, increase diffs timeout #91637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/8.0] Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91635
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Respect StackTraceHiddenAttribute #91572
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix x64 crossbuild on macOS arm64 #91413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix allocation in DateTime.TryParse when it returns false #91303
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Fix overly aggressive assert about array rank #91651
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Switch the `AppWithSubDirs` project used for single-file tests to project that is built outside of test runs #91477
    test-enhancement, area-Host

Updated

  • Move CoreCLR community platforms to build with the global build template #91646
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Handle mistyped commas in morph in pre-order too #91587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Separate running PAL tests out to their own jobs/steps. #91643
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Reduce IL size for `BitConverter.GetBytes` #91639
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Validate hardcoded offsets to PROFILE_PLATFORM_SPECIFIC_DATA struct #91595
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Start vectorizing TensorPrimitives #91596
    area-System.Numerics
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ensure VN handles both forms of the xarch shift instructions for SIMD #91601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [c11] define mono atomics in terms of standard atomics #91489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64, RISC-V] Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch for LoongArch64 and RISC-V. #91531
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement timezoneinfo functions #91458
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Fix ENABLE_CHECKED_CASTS build and transform it into ENABLE_CHECKED_BUILDS_ option #91630
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][jit] Enable all X86Base intrinsics #91393
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][tvOS] Fix building runtime tests on iOS-like platforms #91542
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][wip] Test linux-x64 full AOT llvm job #91019
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve scalability of monitored Counter / UpDownCounter #91566
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [release/8.0] [browser] ENVIRONMENT_IS_WEB is also true on WebWorker #91627
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Update the assert to include Vector64/Vector128 CreateScalar #91504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Migrate from catch_all to catch in the jiterpreter and destroy exceptions #91364
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove CMake version checks #91632
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Restore fails if any workload is missing for any `TargetFramework`, even when it is not the one targetted by the build #35176
  • dotnet tool has a verbosity mode but it isn't silent in mode "quiet" #35173

Closed

  • Warning caused by EnableAOTAnalyzer points to IsAotCompatible #34505
  • [net7] Creating a cross-targeted `net7.0-ios` + `net6.0-ios` packages forces consumers to build with net7 workloads #30103

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Asp.Net FrameworkReference in BrowserRefresh #35190
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35185
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Adjust trim/aot warning messages #35186
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35150
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2261094 #35170
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add mac signing to the other fork of the code path #35168
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Container Build: Add tar.gz (Docker Archive) file writing #35151
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Avoid loading all types when invoking Hot Reload handlers, handle type load failures #35077
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Update Verify.Xunit package version #35146
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OperationVisitor cannot handle NoneOperation #69837
  • EnC: Updating type of a property creates a duplicate Property table entry #69834
  • Is VS displaying for internal names expected? #69830
  • Some commonly-reported diagnostic results at suggestion level cannot be disabled #69829
    17.8

Closed

  • Improve debugging experience of iterator properties #69827
  • Fuzz test the incremental state table #68459
    17.8
  • PERF: PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() unnecessarilly allocates when lazyNamespaces is empty #69833
  • DisallowNull, T? and inheritance #69832
  • File rename that changes case crashes a NavBar and Semantic Classification #69269
    17.8 P2
  • Don't give a diagnostic for inability to convert to an error type #69138
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Randomize analyzer instantiation to avoid static constructor/jit contention #69838
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix some issues with the MSBuild NuGet packaging #69835
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle long extension invocation chains #69831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Make completion handler more resilient #69795
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix test after merge #69836
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #69760
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Modify the test to cover the scenario #69821
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add analysis and emit difference time spans to EnC telemetry #69794
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce cascading diagnostics on failed implicit conversion #69170
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow Razor to not supply dynamic file info if they don't want to. #69828
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump NuGet version #69824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations during ToDisplayString #69800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update LanguageServerHost to use NamedPipe #69816
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Bail out from remove unused member analyzer for ??= operator #69812
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Only sync selection when text identifier has focus in rename flyout #69825
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #69761
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Collection expressions: support builder methods returning derived or implementing types #69770
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create a new documentation page elaborating on various Data Protection error messages #50560
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Introduce a Shared DynamicObject for Cross-Controller Data Exchange #50559
  • Content Disposition header generate invalid filename when semicolon is present #50557
  • Add support to Virtualize.ItemsProvider for partial updates #50555
    Discussions
  • HttpRequestHeaders Keys.Contains is not case insensitive, whereas HttpDictionary is #50553
  • [Blazor] Remove obsolete APIs #50548
    9.0-preview1
  • set serialization method for specific controllers #50540
  • Potentially unsound trimming suppression in DefaultAntiforgeryStateProvider #50536
    Backlog

Closed

  • HTTPS certificate exact match using Issuer's SimpleName instead of Certificate's #49062
    9.0-preview1
  • Add aka.ms links to data protection warnings #22029
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Update jquery-validation dependency in templates to the latest version #50421
    8.0-rc2
  • NSwag.AspNetCore instead of Swashbuckle.AspNetCore #50133
    Discussions
  • QuickGrid does not support 'record'-based objects #50534
  • CascadingTypeParameter aliases #50544
  • StaticHtmlRenderer escapes apostrophes/quotes unnecessarily, breaking script blocks #49797
    8.0-rc2
  • Expose AccessTokenResponse from the new BearerToken AuthenticatonHandler #49424
    8.0-rc2
  • Aspnetcore server check websocket connection status wrong. #50515
  • Blazor Server-Side Rendering CORS issue with Microsoft.Identity.Web & Azure B2C #49814
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly misinterprets Content-Type on wasm file, uses slow ArrayBuffer instantiation #49621
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor SSR - can't wrap layout Body with interactive component #50518
  • Two forms on same page results in null ref #49821
    8.0-rc2
  • Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead. #50529
  • .NET 8 Preview 7 - Possible form handling regression Blazor SSR #49965
    8.0-rc2
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile code with CS8601 warning for required non-nullable record parameters #49381
    8.0-rc2
  • FromQueryAttribute with Name does not work when added to property of an object with AsParametersAttribute #50408
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Dynamically toggle navigation interception #50564
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Support injecting keyed services with `[Inject]` #50561
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2261203 #50558
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, tell-mode
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template #50554
    area-blazor
  • Enhanced navigation redirections. Make form enhancement opt-in. #50551
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Error page support for Server Side Rendered Razor Component Applications #50550
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Obsolete Router.PreferExactMatches #50545
    area-blazor
  • Update help link and aka.ms references for RDG #50542
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Update Microsoft.IdentityModel to 7.0.0-preview5 #50538
    area-infrastructure
  • Support resolving IFormFile in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update CertificateLoader.cs #50474
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Tidy up aka.ms links in data protection error messages #50465
    area-dataprotection, 8.0-rc2
  • Revert "[Blazor] Update selenium versions" #50556
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50483
    area-infrastructure, area-ui-rendering, 7.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50484
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 6.0.23
  • Fix grammar in doc comments (a vs an) #50552
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Update jquery-validation to v1.19.5 #50482
    area-ui-rendering, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix IIS OutOfProc sometimes creating multiple app instances after recycle #50535
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking
  • Increment HubProtocol version for Stateful Reconnect #50442
    area-signalr
  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-signalr
  • Fix dropping messages on reconnect #50409
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Document the coupling between KestrelServerLimits and *TransportOptions #50468
    area-networking
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2261203 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50530
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • Make IEmailSender more customizable #50301
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to use dotnet-trace from sidecar on Azure Container Instances. #4217

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem display a page on Android and IOS #17242
  • Tabbar Selection Style Issues #17237
    .NET 8 GA
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #17236
  • Windows Debug - A cycle occurred while laying out the GUI #17234
    Backlog
  • [Android] PRISM absolute navigation changes app window and MainActivity is being recreated #17233
  • Back button image color can't be changed #17228
    .NET 7 + Servicing

Merged

    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.InvalidOperationException: Nullable object must have a value. EF Core and OData 8 #31655
  • Create fluent API for JsonValueReaderWriter on a property #31647
  • WHERE conditions are duplicated when nested query is reused in LINQ #31646
  • the function of Self join / Self referencing urgently needs to be easy to use in 8.0. #31645
  • 💡 Feature Request: Scaffolding models (via "DB First") can generate enums instead of a string/number if we can give the scaffold some hints #31644

Closed

  • Is it possible to create a value generation strategy so it produces a single value for all the entries saved during SaveChanges? #31608
  • Use C# structs or classes as value objects #9906
    8.0.0-rc2
  • VB.NET generated sql WHERE statement issue #31578
  • Support For Ef Core 6 Free Text #31530
  • Unable to execute "dotnet ef migrations add init" #31527
  • WHERE with tuples and IN operator #31492
  • Is there a schema extraction api? #31476
  • A required response; due continuance #31446
  • 'Could not load type 'System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute' from assembly 'System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a'.' #31425
  • How to get Point-Read with EF Core 6.0 & CosmosDB, Find & FindAsync methods #27679
    8.0.0
  • An issue with query filtering and aggregation, after upgrading from 6.0.0 to 6.0.16 #31255
  • Implement complex types (value objects) #13947
    8.0.0-rc1
  • Allow Multi-region or Application Preferred Regions in EF Core Cosmos #29424
    8.0.0
  • Add embedded READMEs to NuGet packages #26556
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Add type mapping APIs to customize JSON value serialization/deserialization #30677
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Primitive collection type mapping infra doesn't support reverse-engineering #31505
  • Filtering on fields that have conversion do not convert correctly when using "IN" operator #31577
  • Trying to instruct EF Core to generate GUIDs on INSERT, but also let me set my own values - fails #31642

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #31597 - RC1: UnreachableException when loading with proxies and a JSON-mapped complex property #31656
  • Make RelationalEntityTypeExtensions.GetDefaultTableName return null for owned abstract types in a TPC hierarchy #31653
  • Map complex type properties to nullable columns when the complex type is declared on a derived type in TPH. #31652
  • Call appropriate assign method in JSON shaper #31651

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31650
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Add readme for sql server #30466
    propose-close
  • Cosmos: use Point-Read when the key is a Guid. #31639
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31649
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Cosmos: Add a way to configure Application Preferred Regions #31643
  • Add readme for EFcore.Desgin NuGet package #30471
    propose-close
  • Add readme file for nuget package EFCore.Tools #30470
    propose-close
  • Validate complex properties are not null when saving #31584
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31641
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [bug-fix] Use token for NonQueryResultAsync #31449

Issues
